thread.title: Mr. BRIAN TORMEY
thread.title_full: SkyLux Travel reviewed by Mr. BRIAN TORMEY

author: Mr. BRIAN TORMEY
title: Mr. BRIAN TORMEY
text:
Oxy is UNBELIEVABLE!!!! She has infinite amount of patience Calmly and efficiently put together a very complex business trip. In doing so she save me several thousand dollars. The whole process was fantastic with all option explored and clearly explained in detail.
Can't even begin to express my gratitude especially when I made major changes in the middle of the process.
